ai-patthana15.83:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.83:1.1_0: Diversity of the teaching doesn’t give rise to confidence. Continued existence is a condition for rebirth.
ai-patthana15.83:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
ai-patthana15.83:2.1_0: There is a cause or condition for the death, not the cause.
ai-patthana15.83:2.1_1: There is a middle thing, which is not a condition for the attachment to rebirth.
ai-patthana15.83:2.1_2: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
ai-patthana15.83:3.1_0: There is no reality of the teaching for the sake of non-conflict. Clication is a condition for the arising.
ai-patthana15.83:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
